channel.title: Need help with editing log in screen
channel.description: plz anyone i need to know how to edit and make the login screen what i want it to be

item.title: Need help with editing log in screen
item.dc:creator: @fizzle fizzle
item.description:
@fizzle wrote:

the only thing i need to do is edit the client and i need to change the background for my log in screen can someone give me a good step by step on how to do that… i have no source becuae me and a friend are workin on it and he has the source

item.title: Need help with editing log in screen
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

OK, here is how to do it if you have [317] client.

1.open client folder.
2.open the ‘files’ folder.
3.open the ‘spirts’ folder.
4.find your image.
5.right click the image and select ‘edit’. if it doesn’t open up in paint, then right click the image and select ‘open with’ then select paint.
6.now copy the image you want (as long as its close to the same size as the already existing image) and paste it over the already existing image.
7.now save and you’re done!

Hope this helped!!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with editing log in screen
